column1: The text inserted before the endheader tag and after the begintrailer tag are kept after the document generation. You can so define the text according to your needs.
The default.csv file is used as a template:
- for a given project if it is located in the <Project_Dir>\configuration\documentation directory.
- for all the projects if it is located in the <ControlBuild_Install_Dir>\tooldir\configuration\documentation directory if there's no other template in the project directories.
